title: [Large-Scale] Introductory Computer Science Laboratory: Structured Problem-Solving and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy (document creation, internet research, etc.)
context.additional_context: Operated in parallel with a practical lab and online platform, applying collaborative activities and iterative feedback systems among learners.

learning_goals: Understand the basic principles of algorithms and express them in simple pseudocode
Complete team-based problem-solving projects using collaboration tools (e.g., GitHub, online whiteboards)
Version control systems can be applied to track code changes and document collaboration history
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
